original_title: Two companies from Russia, India to take over management of Mattala airport
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has green-lighted the proposal to hand over the management of Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport to a selected private sector company which has submitted Expressions Of Interest (EOI) for the purpose.

Accordingly, the Cabinet approval has been received to hand over the management of Mattala Rajapaksa International Airport to Shaurya Aeronautics Pvt. Ltd of India or Airports of Regions Management Company of Russia or an affiliated company thereof for a period of 30 years.
